TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHttpModule

Docs.summary: Provides module initialization and disposal events to the implementing class.

remarks.format: ## Examples For an example of a custom module that implements IHttpModule, see [Walkthrough: Creating and Registering a Custom HTTP Module](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the module that implements .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Dispose method performs any final cleanup work prior to removal of the module from the execution pipeline.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Init(class System.Web.HttpApplication context) cil managed

Docs.param: An that provides access to the methods, properties, and events common to all application objects within an ASP.NET application
Docs.summary: Initializes a module and prepares it to handle requests.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the Init method to register event handling methods with specific events.
## Examples For an example of a custom module that implements <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule>, see [Walkthrough: Creating and Registering a Custom HTTP Module](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
